name: Cats with Hats (MiniJam 127)
description:
Controls:

Move : Arrow keys / WASD

Select: Mouse / Return / Space

----------

Cats with hats is a small game made for the Mini jam 127 - Cats:

Search for matching hats, attention here, not matching cards, matching hats.

Once you flip a card you will see what hat the cat is wearing.

Find all matches before the time runs out.
